hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: TCNG_BUILD_IMAGE.bin
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: The FW OIV image which will be flashed on the dev_board and tested against.

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: The built artifacts including TCNG_QA headers/drivers which are all required for QA component testing.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
whoami pwd
echo " ******************* $TCNG_FW *****************************"
#export TCNG_CFG_DIR=${HOME}/myRepos/net-automation export TCNG_CFG_DIR=${HOME}/workspace/TCNG_QA/ci export TCNG_PACKAGE_ROOT=${WORKSPACE}/var/workspace/TCNG_Software
echo "Going to decide which platform to be built ..." if [ $TCNG_BUILD_TYPE == "PRODUCTION" ] then JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR=production_tcng_jenkins_images else JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR=latest_tcng_jenkins_images fi
export TNT_PLATFORM_NAME=$PLATFORM_NAME
if [ -e TCNG_BUILD_IMAGE.bin ] then echo "Going to untar the tarball for testing ... TCNG_BUILD_IMAGE.bin" export FLASH_IMAGE_PATH=TCNG_BUILD_IMAGE.bin else echo "No tarball provided, so use the default one ..." export FLASH_IMAGE_PATH=`ls -t /tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/${TNT_PLATFORM_NAME}/*.bin | head -1` fi
echo "Going to setup the environments for TCNG framework ..." source $TCNG_CFG_DIR/cfg.tcng/source_me_first_tcng_env.sh
rm -rf var QA_TARBALL="/tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/${TNT_PLATFORM_NAME}/tcng_package_qa.tar.gz" if [ -e TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz ] then echo "Going to untar the tarball for testing ... TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz" QA_TARBALL="TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz" fi tar --atime-preserve -xvf ${QA_TARBALL} > /dev/null
export TCNG_TEST_SUITE=$TCNG_CFG_DIR/cfg.tcng/$TCNG_TESTSUITE.xml
echo "Run the TCNG test ..." $TCNG_CFG_DIR/myex.pl --config $TCNG_CFG_DIR/cfg.tcng/TCNG_Test_Only.cfg
if [ -e test_reports ] then echo "Goging to save the testing logs" test_report_tarball=TCNG_TestResult.tar.gz tar -zcvf ${test_report_tarball} test_reports ${QA_TARBALL} dest_dir="/tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/${TNT_PLATFORM_NAME}/test_reports" echo "Goging to save the testing logs under ${dest_dir} ..." mkdir -p ${dest_dir} && cp ${test_report_tarball} ${dest_dir} fi
